column5: Bonham . With a ferocious, powerful and flamboyant drumming style, he was an integral part of Led Zeppelin , and one of the notable reasons behind their success. He is regarded by his peers as &lsquo
column6: the perfect model for all hard rock drummers that have followed him&rsquo
column8: s hard to disagree. If we&rsquo
column9: re going to admire him, let not only admire his incredible talent, but also the fact he could make a string vest look cool!
